plot: Eiko is a high-spirited young woman who falls for her handsome tennis coach, Kazuo. He plans to propose after going mountain-climbing with friends, but is killed by an avalanche. Can Eiko find love again?
title: Taifû to zakuro
plot_es: Eiko is a high-spirited young woman who falls for her handsome tennis coach, Kazuo. He plans to propose after going mountain-climbing with friends, but is killed by an avalanche. Can Eiko find love again?
plot_en: Eiko is a high-spirited young woman who falls for her handsome tennis coach, Kazuo. He plans to propose after going mountain-climbing with friends, but is killed by an avalanche. Can Eiko find love again?
